feed.title: NocoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.257.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: NC_DB env nolonger support MySQL server ??? #9658
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Failed to decrypt any source or integration. Please configure correct encryption key. #9653
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Set Date default value to today #9644
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Pin datasheets as favorites for quick access #9635
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: conditional fields, show field alias if configured instead of actual field name #9611
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Open .doc format is not working. #9495
  • [closed] Adding Elestio as deployment option #9481
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Meta API for get all bases with 403 response #9444
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Form description revert to original after a while (Duplicate) #9340
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ”¦ Feature: the calculated items in the footer automatically calculated #9331
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Link URLs are sometimes not working - link takes me to a different view #9202
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Use AWS instance/container IAM profiles for S3 access #6819
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Deleting a table/project with attachment columns doesn't delete them on filesystem #5919
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: API - Delete Attachment #5152
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: import data from excel or csv ,the header changed #4841
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Trigger selected webhooks for selected rows manually #3868
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature][â˜ Scope : API] Fields toggle API input should be an array #2194

What's Changed

  • Release 0.257.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9625

  • fix(nc-gui): conditional fields, show field alias if configured instead of actual field name by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9640
  • Nc fix/view download option by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9643

  • Chore/timely docker build by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9645
  • Add service Label to NocoDB image for compatibility with Kamal by @tuladhar in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9631
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9646
  • Nc include cloud release by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9647
  • Nc cloud/changelog by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9629
  • Added one-click deploy template for RepoCloud.io by @cosark in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/7412
  • chore: Optimize timely docker build time by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9648
  • enhancement: increase file size limit to 25MB in QuickImport.vue (ref: #5858) by @AthrunAshy in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9654
  • feat: Added Elestio as one-click deploy option by @kaiwalyakoparkar in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9482

  • Add fallback mechanism in decrypt upgrader by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9661

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.0 : Infinite scroll
entry.content:
Weâ€™re excited to introduce Infinite Scroll in NocoDB! This new feature lets you seamlessly scroll through your records without needing to click through pages. As you scroll, additional records load automatically, making it easier and faster to browse large datasets. Enjoy a smoother, more efficient experience with Infinite Scroll in NocoDB!

Demo video : https://youtu.be/gbAJApMkHRc

Other updates

Auto Row Expansion for Bulk Paste

With the new Auto Row Expansion feature, NocoDB now automatically creates new rows when you paste multiple records from a CSV. This allows you to paste large sets of data without pre-creating rows, saving you time and reducing manual effort.

Feature Preview

Enable or disable experimental features with ease, allowing you to explore and evaluate upcoming functionalities.

Closed issues

  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Link field error if table name is lengthy #9760
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: minio: Invalid endPoint if https is included such as in https://minio-api.some.domain #9757
  • [closed] Bug: Cannot reset password. Always "Password reset successful!" #9751
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: No "equal to" option in AND conditional statements #9745
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] Bugï¼šAfter dragging the record to a different date, the date display on the right is not updated. #9732
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Can't sync external database (Postgres 17) #9728
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Prefill form is not working if field name contains ? at the end e.g., field name = age ? #9719
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: NotFoundError: Failed to execute 'insertBefore' on 'Node': The node before which the new node is to be inserted is not a child of this node. #9713
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: GCS does not work with uniform bucket-level access #9712
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Error when enabling Locked mode in Form view #9710
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: API documentation missing an entry in "Request Body schema" #9702
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: self hosted, data-api slow performance on linking records #9692
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Record not found error when id contains 3 or more consecutive underscores #9679
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][ğŸ”´ Priority : Critical] ğŸ› Bug: Updating description of LTAR/Links column breaking column meta #9677
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Calendar current time cursor is in the wrong place #9558
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][ğŸ” Status: More Info Needed] ğŸ› Bug: Search doesn't find entry but filter does #9514
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: One-To-One Link Field - Cannot Search #9439
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Support for @mentions in Text fields #9102
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][Status: Reproducible] ğŸ› Bug: No belongs-to column for link to same table #8958
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Form enhancements/bugs #7235
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Comments added through API TOKEN request cannot be displayed, but are displayed normally through JWT TOKEN #7132
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Infinite Scroll on table #3568

What's Changed

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [âœ¨ Type: Enhancement] Change button text to "Update Connection" (from "Modify Connection") #9841
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Invalid Date error format in calendar view #9808
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot reset password. Always "Password reset successful!" #9752
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: l.base.duplicateShared is not a function when click copy base button on share base view #9675
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Application crashes when concatenating date intervals using & operator in Excel. #9650
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: CSV import doesn't care for duplicated field names #9572
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] Shared base with Editor access to be deprecated #9414
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Formula - Allow easier way to check if a cell is empty #9346
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ› Bug: Session time's out abruptly (before refresh token expiry) #9311

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.3: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
ğŸ› Closed Issues

  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Multi select content vanishing on page turn #9902
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][ğŸ—ï¸ Type: In Develop Branch] ğŸ› Bug: can't upload csv to table with checkbox field #9891
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug][ğŸ—ï¸ Status: In Resolution] ğŸ› Bug: Cannot use s3 ovh plugin, error: "cannot read property of undefined (reading builder)" #9890
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Date Format #9869
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Form validation is failing if field name includes [] square brackets #9856
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Can't paste in search box for linked table #9846
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Duplicate Storage Providers in Setup Page #9828
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: webhook is not working with External Source DB #9787
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Date Range field type and show on Calendar #9785
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: One-To-One Link Field - Cannot Search #9439
  • [ğŸ› Type: Bug] ğŸ› Bug: Issue with last record while paginating #9376
  • [closed] ğŸ› Bug: Initial invitation e-mail is sent twice #8460
  • [closed] ğŸ”¦ Feature: Personal view or how to how to allocate work space. #6252
  • [ğŸ”¦ Type: Feature] [Feature] Rollback the database changes to certain time or tag #2077

What's Changed

  • Release 0.258.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9854
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9820

  • Nc calendar end date by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9831
  • fix(nc-gui): form view elements over the attachment/pdf viewer by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9867
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9868
  • docs: Nested list and commented lines corrections by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9872
  • New Crowdin updates by @o1lab in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9870
  • fix: Handle sharedExecution timeout error in interceptor by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9873
  • fix: missing await for jobid generation by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9877
  • fix: hide twitter feed by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9885
  • fix(nc-gui): disable link cell paste if link record dropdown is open by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9887

  • fix: use alias when constructing hm filter query to avoid self-reference issue by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9899
  • Nc feat/user delete by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9889
  • fix: One-to-one excluded list filter bug by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9903
  • fix: calendar followups by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9901
  • fix: data is missing when select option is added via cell by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9906
  • fix: Base invite email related issues by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9907
  • fix: Merge duplicate plugin and recover broken plugins by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9894
  • 0.258.3 Pre-release by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9909

New Contributors

  • @yooneskh made their first contribution in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/9822

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.258.2...0.258.3

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.258.10: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
âš ï¸ Deprecation of audit logs v1

When we initially introduced audit logs (v1), they were a foundational feature but remained incomplete and remained underdeveloped over time.

Hereâ€™s how: - Limited Coverage: The existing audit logs captured less than 25% of the actions within the product. Key operationsâ€”such as creating or modifying fields, filters, sorts, views, row comments, collaborators and webhooks etcâ€”were not tracked at all. Over 150+ releases, the logs failed to keep up with NocoDBâ€™s expanding feature set. - Incomplete Information: Even for the events that were logged, the data was partial and insufficient. For example record audit details often appeared fragmented, leaving gaps that fell short of enterprise-grade requirements.

As part of our commitment to providing the best possible experience with NocoDB we decided to deprecate audit logs v1. So audit logs v1 no longer be part of the open-source (OSS) variant and Enterprise Audit Logs (v2) will be introduced & exclusively available to self-hosted enterprise users and cloud users.

Audit Logs v2 built from the ground up to address these gaps to offer:

  • Comprehensive coverage of all critical actions within NocoDB.
  • Detailed and reliable logs suited to enterprise use cases.

We will always be transparent and proactive in every change, if you are looking for comprehensive audit logs (v2) - it will be soon available in our self-hosted and cloud enterprise solution.
